snippet.title: Empyreal Silent Games TRAILER - PC Gaming Show Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Empyreal is a third-person action RPG set in the far flung reaches of space, where you play a mercenary tasked with unlocking the secrets of an ancient Monolith built by a lost civilisation. Expect fast-paced combat, tough boss fights, and the ability to batter enemies with a massive shield. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377700/Empyreal/
https://www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #empyreal
